title: Authentic Nicoise Salad
ingredients: ['6 eggs', '1 cucumber, peeled', '8 tomatoes, diced', '1 stick celery, diced', '1 green pepper, diced', '50g fresh parsley, chopped', '1 tin of tuna, in oil', '10 olives', '8 anchovy fillets', 'For the vinaigrette', '3 teaspoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar', 'Salt and pepper']
